short_summary: Routine road maintenance within National Park
description: Routine road maintenance within National Park seeking bidding for line painting and asphalt sealing. All materials to be used must adhere to regulations set out in the National Park Act. Bids are open to contractors who identify themselves as qualified to perform services within the region. Submissions should be made by fax or email to the Government Electronic Tendering Service.
full_summary:
### Line Painting and Crack Sealing Tender - Waterton Lakes National Park

**Notice of Tender**

Parks Canada Agency is soliciting bids for the line painting and asphalt sealing project at various locations within Waterton Lakes National Park as part of routine road maintenance.

**Solicitation Information**

* Invitation Reference Number: cb-661-58005107
* Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0335/A
* Publication Date: April 15, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 14, 2024, at 16:00 hours MDT
* Amendment Date: May 14, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 21, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Scope of Work**

The scope of this contract includes line painting and asphalt sealing at various locations within Waterton Lakes National Park.

**Acceptable Tender Methods**

Bids may be submitted by fax or email to soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca, or by mail to the address below. No bids will be accepted in person or by courier.

**Tender Documents**

The solicitation documents, including addenda and any subsequent amendments, may be accessed on the Government of Canada's tendering service at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). Bidders must submit their bids in accordance with the solicitation requirements.

**Language**

Tender documents are available in both official languages (English and French) and responders are encouraged to submit their proposals in one or both languages.

**Attention for Submitters**

Please note that the email attachment file size limit for submissions is 15 megabytes. Bidders may submit their bids in multiple emails if required.

**Withdrawal of Bids**

All bids must be submitted before the tender closing date, May 14, 2024, at 16:00 hours MDT.

**Accessing Tender Information**

This tender is accessible at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/Opportunity/361421.
